title: LeaveBuster when my computer crashed
body: I was loading into the game, my laptop crashed, i rejoined and finished. I got leavebuster right then and there. I didnt know you get leavebuster for having your computer crash.

replies.body: Anytime the game notices that you're AFK for a certain amount of time or have disconnected from the match, you may be hit with those low priority queues. It might seem a little unfair, but your teammates were still left with trying to 4v5 in that game.

Oh, what if it was an Intro Bot match? Cause that is what I was doing before it happened. Its very unfair since I dont even have a computer that cant even run the game properly at very low, which the game cause my laptop to crash alot.
then you should ourchase a better computer and understand the consequences. i disconnected, joined back 2 minutes later and it turned into a remake. Feels bad man
Is there anything I can do about this being wrongly placed on me? I really dont feel like this is fair.
